compliant.legal provisions: The collection of personal information is clearly stated, including the types of information collected and the purpose of collection.

compliant.section: 我們如何使用您的資訊
compliant.legal provisions: The policy specifies the purposes for which personal information will be used, ensuring transparency.
The policy provides a mechanism for individuals to request changes or deletion of their personal information.
The policy mentions that it will be updated periodically, which aligns with the requirement for transparency.

non_compliant.legal provisions: The policy does not provide sufficient information on how users can manage their cookie preferences or opt-out options.
non_compliant.amend: Include a clear explanation of how users can manage cookie settings and provide an opt-out mechanism.

non_compliant.section: 我們如何使用您的資訊
non_compliant.legal provisions: The policy lacks explicit consent mechanisms for the use of personal information beyond the stated purposes.
non_compliant.amend: Add a section detailing how explicit consent will be obtained for any use of personal information beyond the initial collection purpose.

non_compliant.legal provisions: The policy does not specify how users will be notified of changes to the privacy policy.
non_compliant.amend: Include a clear notification process for users regarding updates to the privacy policy.
